content:
Dear All,

I had never before used the copy message to comment function in the Infoview, but decided to give it a try.

image.png

It seems very useful for doing exactly what it advertises, which I am finding very convenient, now that I am preparing "standalone" lean files.
However, I think that this behaviour is not the intended one:

#print Nat
/-  What is below is what is in the Infoview, copy-pasted by me
inductive Nat : Type
number of parameters: 0
constructors:
Nat.zero : Nat
Nat.succ : Nat â†’ Nat
-/

-- However, this is what VSCode prints, when I click on `copy message to comment`
/-
inductive Nat :
number of parameters: 0
constructors:
Nat.zero :
Nat.succ :
-/
--  all the Type information is gone!  The same happens with theorems and axioms.

Is this what I should expect? If not, am I doing something wrong?

Thanks!
Thanks, Gabriel! I was not aware of the existing issue.
